searchBundleByPatientIdentifier

Parameter patient.identifier:token

Search for a bundle containing a patient with a specific identifier

ResourceBundle
ExpressionBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Patient).identifier
Processing ModeNormal
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: searchBundleByPatientIdentifier
description: Search for a bundle containing a patient with a specific identifier
